animals.Name: 猴子
animals.EnDspt: An animal with a long tail, that climbs trees and lives in hot countries. They have several types and they are related to apes and humans.
animals.ZhDspt: 一种有着长长的尾巴，生长在热带国家的动物。 他们在世界上有很多种类，并且他们与类人猿和人类有很大的联系。

animals.Name: 老鼠
animals.EnDspt: A small animal that is covered in fur and has a long thin tail. They live in fields, in people's houses or where food is stored.
animals.ZhDspt: 一种身着毛皮，有着细长尾巴的动物。它们生活在田地里，人类的房子里或者存放食物的地方。

animals.Name: 狗
animals.EnDspt: An animal with four legs and a tail, often kept as a pet or trained for work, for example hunting or guarding buildings. They have many types, some of which are wild.
animals.ZhDspt: 一种有着四条腿和尾巴的动物，他们常常被当作宠物养着，或则被训练做一些事情，比如狩猎或者看守房子。世界上有很多种类，其中有野生的，也有家里养的。

animals.Name: 鹿
animals.EnDspt: An animal with long legs, that eats grass, leaves, etc. and can run fast. Most males have antlers (= horns shaped like branches).
animals.ZhDspt: 有一种动物，他们有着长长的腿，他们通常吃草或者树叶等等，并且可以跑的非常快。绝大多数公的都有多叉角。

animals.Name: 鱼
animals.EnDspt: A creature that lives in water, breathes through gills , and uses fins and a tail for swimming.
animals.ZhDspt: 一种生活在水里的动物，他们靠腮呼吸，采用鳍和尾巴游泳。

animals.Name: 大象
animals.EnDspt: A very large animal with thick grey skin, large ears, two curved outer teeth called tusks and a long nose called a trunk.
animals.ZhDspt: 有一种动物有着厚厚的灰色皮肤，大大的耳朵，两个弯曲向外生长的长牙，还有一条长长的大鼻子。

animals.Name: 猪
animals.EnDspt: An animal with pink, black or brown skin, short legs, a broad nose and a short tail which curls round itself.
animals.ZhDspt: 有一种动物有着粉色的、黑色的或者棕色的皮肤，短短的腿，宽宽的鼻子，短短的尾巴卷曲着。

animals.Name: 蛇
animals.EnDspt: A reptile with a very long thin body and no legs, some of which are poisonous.
animals.ZhDspt: 一种匍匐爬行的动物，它细长的身体，但是却没有脚，有些还是有毒。

animals.Name: 鹰
animals.EnDspt: A large bird of prey(= a bird that kills other creatures for food) with a sharp curved beak and very good sight.
animals.ZhDspt: 一种捕杀其他动物作为食物的鸟，他们有一双弯曲锐利的爪和敏锐的视力。

animals.Name: 猫
animals.EnDspt: A small animal with soft fur that people often keep as a pet, they catch and kill birds and mice.
animals.ZhDspt: 有一种小动物，他们有着软软的皮毛，人们通常把他们作为宠物喂养。它们捕杀鸟和老鼠。

animals.Name: 鸡
animals.EnDspt: A large bird that is often kept for its eggs or meat.
animals.ZhDspt: 一种比较大的鸟，人们食养他们主要是为获得他们的蛋和肉。

animals.Name: 马
animals.EnDspt: A large animal with four legs, a mane (= long thick hair on its neck) and a tail. They are used for riding on, pulling carriages , etc.
animals.ZhDspt: 一种比较大的动物，有着长长的鬃毛和尾巴。通常用来骑的，也有用于拉车。

animals.Name: 松鼠
animals.EnDspt: A small animal with a long thick tail and red, grey or black fur. They eat nuts and live in trees.
animals.ZhDspt: 一种小动物有着粗粗的尾巴和红色、灰色或者黑色的毛。They主要吃坚果，并且住在树上。

animals.Name: 龙
animals.EnDspt: (in stories) A large aggressive animal with wings and a long tail, that can breathe out fire.
animals.ZhDspt: （在故事中）一种具有侵略性的动物，他们有翅膀和长长的尾巴，而且还能吐火。

animals.Name: 乌龟
animals.EnDspt: A reptile with a hard round shell, that lives on land and moves very slowly. It can pull its head and legs into its shell.
animals.ZhDspt: 一种爬行动物，有着厚厚的贝壳，他们生活在陆地上，并且移动缓慢，他们能把自己的脑袋和尾巴放到他们壳里。

animals.Name: 鹅
animals.EnDspt: A bird like a large duck with a long neck. They either live wild or are kept on farms.
animals.ZhDspt: 有一种鸟，长得像鸭子，有着长长的脖子，有野生的，也有食养的。

animals.Name: 山羊
animals.EnDspt: An animal with horns and a coat of hair, that lives wild in mountain areas or is kept on farms for its milk or meat.
animals.ZhDspt: 有一种动物长着两只角，并且长了一身的毛，他们生长在山区，或者被圈养在农场，可以得到牛奶或肉。
